item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- Captioning] Refined Semantic Enhance. towards Freq. Diffusion (AAAI 2022)
item.description: Refined Semantic Enhancement towards Frequency Diffusion for Video Captioning (AAAI 2022) 开源代码传送门 概述 Video Captioning 任务。 本文提出一种 Refined Semantic enhancement method towards Frequency Diffusion (RSFD) 方法。 模型架构
